name: 24 Hours of Lemons
description:
This is made for the “this game is way too long jam.” I don’t recommend buying it.

The theme of the jam was essentially "games that would probably be fun in short amounts but extend it way too long," and this game definitely fits the theme.

If you buy it you’ve been warned!

It's race time for the famed 24 Hours of Le Mans endurance race but  no one else has shown up! Guess it's time to set a personal record!

Race the track for 24 real time hours to see how many laps you can get in!

You can pause the game but you can't save. The only way to set a high score is to take part in the full 24 hours of the race!

Supports keyboard and controllers.
